author: lgo
msg: Follow up r2123, make PREFIX work again if LIBDIR isn't specified.
* SConstruct:
(default_libdir): Use $PREFIX as default prefix dir.
(PathVariable LIBDIR): Fix typo.

author: lgo
msg: Fix issue #121: scons CFLAGS doesn't accept more than one flag.
* SConstruct: Make CFLAGS, LIBS, LINKFLAGS and CPPFLAGS take a space-separated
list so that flags like "-Wl,-foo,fooval" can be specified.

author: astieger
msg: Fix issue #112: add soname
SConstruct would not set an SONAME or create versioned shared library
files. Use SHLIBVERSION and InstallVersionedLib to do that. This is
supported with scons 2.3.0.
* SConstruct: add SHLIBVERSION and use InstallVersionedLib
* README: note that this works on scons 2.3.0

author: astieger
msg: Fix issue #111: fix hardcoded library path
The installation to platform-dependent library direcories was not
possible. Fix by introducing the LIBDIR parameter which defaults to
/usr/local/lib and, if specified so, can install to /usr/lib{,64}.
* SConstruct: add LIBDIR parameter
* README: add explanatory text and example for packagers

author: lgo
msg: Fix issue #120: Error with ssl tunnel over proxy with KeepAlive off and Basic
authentication.
Don't requeue the CONNECT request on a new connection after the old connection
was reset by an 407 response. A CONNECT request will be automatically created
when setting up a new connection, if the queue already had one from a previous
connection, that extra request will be sent to the server over the ssl tunnel.
(which is wrong).
This also fixes an (not reported) issue where the application's credentials
callback function is called with requeued CONNECT request (which the app doesn't
know) an a NULL baton, potentially causing crashes in the application.
* test/test_context.c
(ssltunnel_basic_auth): Take a new parameter proxy_resp_hdrs and add it
value as headers to the responses of the proxy.
(test_ssltunnel_basic_auth,
test_ssltunnel_basic_auth_server_has_keepalive_off): Update call to
ssltunnel_basic_auth with an empty proxy header.
(test_ssltunnel_basic_auth_server_has_keepalive_off): New test.
(test_context): Run the new test.
* outgoing.c
(reset_connection): When requeueing requests on a new connection, filter
out the CONNECT request.
